metadata.description: The darkness is coming to Wainright, Alaska. A group of frozen bodies are eerily and impossibly arranged at the top of a 40-foot pole so FBI agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully are called in to investigate. X-Files/ 30 Days of Night brings together two iconic franchises, pitting the government's best supernatural investigators against a horde of parasitic vampires.
metadata.name: The X-Files/30 Days of Night
